title: Would Saint Peter’s University Make the WSJ’s Sweet 16 of Affordability?
sub_head: The Journal’s bracket simulates the men’s and women’s NCAA tournament results based on the average prices students pay to attend
body: When Saint Peter’s University, a tiny school in Jersey City, N.J., turned into Cinderella by dancing into the Sweet 16 of the NCAA men’s basketball tournament, it took advantage of the moment to brag about itself.
